accommodations.description: Combine work and relaxation in complete serenity. Our Superior Room blends modernity, ergonomics and high-tech equipment: tea and coffee making facilities, minibar and free dial-up Internet. High-speed connection: EUR 12 for 24h. For up to three people
accommodations.label: Superior Room with one queen-size bed and sofa

accommodations.description: Unique features designed especially for you, the Executive Room offers VIP treatment: free WIFI and minibar, Nespresso coffee and wellness kit with bathrobe and slippers. For up to 3 people.

accommodations.description: The Junior Suite offers an open-plan area for relaxation and well-being. Bathroom with separate bathtub and shower, bathrobe, slippers, and free Wi-Fi.

accommodations.description: Our large, stylish Suite boasts two separate rooms: a bedroom and lounge area, and a bathroom with separate bathtub and shower. With bathrobe, slippers, and free Wi-Fi.
accommodations.label: Superior Suite with one queen size bed and sofa

hotel.description: The Novotel Paris Les Halles is a four-star hotel located in the Les Halles area of central Paris. It enjoys direct access to the city's airports and tourist attractions (Eiffel Tower, Disneyland Paris etc.) from Châtelet-Les Halles station. The hotel has  air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, a bar and eight meeting rooms. A public car park is also available. Ideal for a business trip or a vacation with your partner or family.
hotel.enhancedDescription: The Novotel Paris les Halles boasts a perfect location in the heart of Paris, close to several historical sites. You'll be within walking distance of the Louvre, Notre Dame, Beaubourg and the Tuileries for a pleasant stroll around Paris.

seo.description: The Novotel Paris Les Halles is a 4-star hotel situated in central Paris. With the transport hub of the city just at the front of the hotel, major tourist attractions like the Eiffel Tower, Champs Elysees and various museums, are just minutes away with the metro. The nightlife, shopping and dining options around the hotel are numerous. However, the hotel Novotel Paris Les Halles also offers a splendid view over the Les Halles garden from the restaurant atrium. Enjoy your stay in the center of Paris !

salesConditions.label: The booking period is opened between 999 and 21 days before check in date.
The amount due is not refundable even if the booking is cancelled or modified..
The room must be vacated by 12:00 at the latest except in case of Late Check Out.
